storyInfo: Lee just wanted to take a stroll to the produce market. What he did not expect was that this stroll would take more than a decade.

attributes.content: Excuse me, I see you've been circling the market for a while now. Are you having trouble finding what you need?
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Oh, are you talking to me?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I am. We're about to close soon, so if you don't leave, you'll have to spend the night here.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: But it's not even seven.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Heh, knew you weren't from around these parts. This place is a complete mess at night. Nobody in their right mind would keep their doors open late.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: I did happen to arrive just a few days ago. Only settled into an inn around here last night.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: There are so many places you could go to in Lungmen. Why visit our tiny little market?
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Just a little habit of mine. Whenever I go to a new place, I like checking out the local market.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: These places are always a good gauge of customs, mannerisms, and local color.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Aren't all markets the same? Noisy as hell, just a bunch of people coming and going?
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Well, for starters... the market in Shangshu can stay open all night, but not this one here.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: So, were you going to buy something? I'm closing up my stall otherwise.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: What would you recommend?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We're in the dead of summer and it's hot out there. Maybe grab a couple sprigs of wild bamboo shoots and make porridge out of em' to relieve heat and prevent heatstroke.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Hmm, maybe next time then. I don't think the icebox in the inn is big enough to hold half-meter bamboo shoots.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Huh... Strange fellow.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Gonna end up going home late because of him...
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Hey, lou sai, isn't it a bit early to be closing up shop?
attributes.name: Street Thug

attributes.content: (Ugh, can't dodge these scumbags even at this time of day...?)
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: You ready to pay up? Don't forget what you owe me from last month.
attributes.name: Street Thug

attributes.content: B-Business has been slow th-the last few months... I sincerely apologize, but I truly have nothing worthy of your attention...
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Well that's too bad. Get your ass outta here then. Somebody more capable can take your spot.
attributes.name: Street Thug

attributes.content: Hey, wait! What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Let go of me! D-Don't smash it! Please, give me just a little more time! I promise I'll have the money for you!
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Pah! Too late!
attributes.name: Street Thug

attributes.content: Now, now, my brother. Let's play nice here.
Huh, who the hell are you, old man?
attributes.name: Street Thug

attributes.content: Old man? My, you do flatter me with that honorific. I'm more than happy to just be brothers.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'd watch my tone, if I were you. While you're at it, shouldn't you ask who I'm working for?
attributes.name: Street Thug

attributes.content: Would it be the illustrious Lin family?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: If you know that much, then show some respect.
attributes.name: Street Thug

attributes.content: (My goodness. Why do eight out of every ten hoodlums I run into in this city say they're working for Lin?)
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Aha, no wonder why you looked a bit familiar. I remember seeing you at the Lin estate.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Uhh... Y-You know me?
attributes.name: Street Thug

attributes.content: Of course I do. The golden osmanthus flowers were blooming magnificently at Old Lin's place last year, and he made plenty of honeyed osmanthus. Did you also take some home with you?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: O-Of course! Before I left, Old Lin gave me a dozen jars. I couldn't even finish them all.
attributes.name: Street Thug

attributes.content: Hmm, oh my... I forgot to mention, Old Lin doesn't grow sweet osmanthus in front of his house. They're peach trees.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Diu nei ah, do you know Lin or not?
attributes.name: Street Thug

attributes.content: Maybe I do, maybe I don't. But I can say for a fact that you don't.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: If you know what's good for you, beat it. I hear Old Lin's governance is pretty strict. If he knew someone was using his name to do evil, such a man wouldn't get off lightly.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Bah. Talk about rotten luck.
attributes.name: Street Thug

attributes.content: Err... Sir, thank you very much.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Don't worry about it, it's not like I even lifted a finger. The next time you run into these scoundrels, know that there's nothing to be afraid of. Most of these thugs are just nobodies trying to take advantage of the situation to extort people. There's no way real gangsters would be this brazen.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: *sigh*... I'm just a small-time peddler. How can I tell if someone's a big deal?
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Wait, don't go yet.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The icebox in your inn might be small, but it should fit this bag of lychee just fine.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Planted 'em in my own backyard. They're not worth any money, but they should still taste fine. It's the least I can do.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: ...Sir?
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Ahh, I was just thinking, getting to enjoy the wonderful taste of lychee makes the long trek out here worth it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hah, I'm glad to hear it. If you enjoy 'em, feel free to come back any time.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Mr. Lee! Hey, Mr. Lee!
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Well, if it isn't Choi, our honorable vendor. I heard you calling out to me before I even stepped into the market.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I just don't want you left with bamboo shoots that aren't fresh anymore. The cold season is the perfect time to enjoy these winter shoots.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: There's no way they'd go bad in just a few minutes, is there?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Remember to soak them in salt water once you take them back. That'll make 'em last longer.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Maybe next time. The kitchen in the place I rented only has enough room for a couple produce bags before I have to throw them in the icebox.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I won't take no for an answer. This is the finest white-eyed bamboo I have. I saved it for you because you're a man of character.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Really, it's alright. I'll have an honored guest over in just a few days. The stuff's not going to keep for very long.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Oh, you've made friends in Lungmen?
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Not sure friends is the right word.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Then, what must I do to be considered your friend?
Oh, Mr. Lin, are you here to pick up fresh produce for your wife?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The wife isn't so picky. She wouldn't send me to a market more than ten kilometers away just to pick up some bamboo shoots.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: (Wait, Mr. Lee... Is, is it really him...?)
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: (Just treat him as you would a regular passerby.)
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You haven't answered my question yet.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Please, I'm just an ordinary civilian. The man who invites me to a fancy banquet at a nice restaurant is already a bosom friend to me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's not what my men have been telling me. Apparently, you've been in and out of all the small eateries around here this past week.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: If you could've found me at all those other places, why come out to this market so far from home?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I wouldn't make the trip for a few stalks of bamboo shoots, but for a friend, I'd consider it worthwhile.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: You speak too highly of me, Mr. Lin. I just took care of a few odd jobs for you, that's all. Even without me, you would've been able to resolve things just fine.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I disagree. Had you not been there, I doubt the outcome would've been comparable.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Ah... Mr. Lin, I know exactly how much I'm worth.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: So, how do you plan to cook these bamboo shoots? They're very high-quality.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: A nice and simple braising sounds tasty enough.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Such a pedestrian method is a waste of perfectly good ingredients. If you ask me, it'd be better to slaughter a fowlbeast fresh and make some hearty stew.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Then, you're no longer appreciating the delicate sweetness of the bamboo shoots.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Besides...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Let's hear it.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Hah. Besides, these bamboo shoots came from the countryside. They be of willful temperament. I doubt they'd pair well with other ingredients.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The biggest concern is that they grow too well. Even deep in the mountains and ancient forests, they'll attract wave after wave of bamboo shoot diggers.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: That being the case, how could they ever hope to live a life of peace and contentment?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Haha, that remains to be seen.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Wei would not visit a man's home for no reason...
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: I believe.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Believe what?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: I believe... that once Master Wei picks up the chopsticks, he won't be able to stop to chat with me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hmm... Lou sai, do you sell apples here?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Ah, yes, I certainly do. I'll get them for you right away, Mr. Lin.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: How much?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Ah, um, that won't be necessary. The fact that we've been able to live in peace all these years thanks to you is payment enough.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: It's not easy running a business. Here, take it.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Didn't you say you weren't buying anything?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Since I'm already here, might as well grab something for my daughter.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Aiya, men do change after kids. I wanted to invite you to see the flowers at Jiangqi next year, but I suppose I'll have to give up on the idea.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I suggest you settle down as well, and leave behind that life of wandering.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Forget it. That isn't the life I'm searching for anyway.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Madam, take a look at this season's greengage. Thin skin, thick flesh, and a tiny core. Tangy and delectably sweet, one bite and you'll be salivating for more.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: If you don't take a few catties back with you today to make wine, you won't be get to experience this flavor after the Qingming Festival passes.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Alright... Weigh some out for me then.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Right away. You know, there's a saying that goes 'green plum wine tastes freshest in season.' ...Hah, I'm not particularly well-read, I just happened to hear that somewhere.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Choi, I hear you buttering up your customers from over here, trying to get into their pockets, eh? You've... become quite the smooth talker.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Oh come on, it's just business.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Do you come here often, Mr. Lee?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Long time no see. What brings you out here today, Madam?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: This is the largest, most comprehensive produce market in Lungmen. Naturally, the best choice whenever you need ingredients.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: What kind of ingredients need you coming out here in person?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Well, Yenwu's birthday is coming up, and I'd like to make him a few dishes.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: What do you have in mind?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I haven't decided yet, but it wouldn't be anything more than what he normally likes to eat.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I'm sure Master Wei's preferences... must be quite a test for your culinary skills.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hardly. What's a little effort if your heart is in the right place?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Fair enough.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But I'll admit... as this is my first time here, I'm having difficulty picking out what I want. I'd appreciate your advice if you don't mind.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Sure, can do. Take these tomatoes for example. If you want to just eat them as you would a fruit, go with a pink one, which has a crispier texture. If you're cooking with them, opt for the deep red ones, which are juicier and have a stronger taste.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Alright, I'll keep that in mind. They have some taro over there. I'd like to make some taro smoked meat.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Taro, huh? Given tubers of about the same size, go with the heaviest one. That means it has a greater water and starch content, which leads to a soft, glutinous taste.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Great. What about shiitake mushrooms then? Should I go with dried, or fresh?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Both have their advantages, Madam. It all depends on what you want to cook.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Stuffed mushrooms.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Go with dried shiitake in that case, they have greater pungency after soaking.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Oh... I see.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Before I forget, there's a store up ahead that sells soy sauce. It's perfect for making braised fowlbeast.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (Though, they recently raised their prices.)
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: (You don't need to worry about that, Choi.)
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: For the rose petal and soy sauce glaze?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Mmhmm.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Actually about that... Yenwu does eat this dish often, but only because I'm the one who's quite fond of it.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I'm aware.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: He's brought it up at the dinner table before. Is it so unusual for his tastes to take after those of his wife?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Pfft... Haha.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: You're a smoother talker than that vendor.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Haha. Speaking of which, I've become a bit of a businessman myself lately.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Haven't you always been easygoing with your finances? From the very beginning, Yenwu repeatedly asked you to take up a very important position in the L.G.D., but you refused each time. Why are you worrying about your livelihood now?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: There's an extra mouth to feed back home now, so I need to run some errands to cover the living expenses.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hmm? Are you finally starting your own family? Yenwu and I can stop by and offer our congratulations one of these days.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: It's more like... Actually, an old friend came from afar and left a child behind in my care.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: How terribly irresponsible... Did he say when he'd be back?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: No... But there's no way he'd just abandon the girl, right? I reckon he'll be back after a few months.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: After I hand the girl back to him, I plan to take a page out of his book and go on a long trip myself.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What, Lungmen isn't good enough for you?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: No, it certainly is. But, I am a wanderer after all. Can't stay in a single place too long.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: *sigh*... In any case, thanks for your advice, Mr. Lee. I pretty much have everything I need now, so I should get going.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Take it easy, Madam.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Mr. Lee! Psst, Mr. Lee!
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Oh... Did you need something, Choi?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You've been standing here all day, you know? Other people have to shop too.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Sorry about that, haha. How much for the imported cherries?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Didn't you say they were too expensive for you?
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Yes, but the kid likes 'em, so I figure I can take a few catties home and give them a try.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: By the way, did the stuff I ordered from you last week come in yet?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Sure did. I have everything ready for you.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: My, I'm sorry. I had some stuff to take care of at home today. Sorry to keep you waiting.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Haha, don't worry about it. It's not even nine yet, and the sun hasn't even set. Too early to close up.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: But, why'd you come here yourself? Couldn't you just send your apprentice over?
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: He had work to take care of today. We just moved into the new place, so he went with Waai Fu and Aak to tidy up.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You moved? Was the old place getting too cramped?
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Yup. Didn't have as many rooms as I would've liked, which made it hard to have guests over. Also wanted to add another freezer, but the kitchen was too small.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Are two freezers not enough for you?
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: That's what happens when you have multiple mouths to feed. Thankfully, Hung's learned the ropes by now, or I'd keel over dead from all that cooking.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You know, nobody's gonna shed any tears if none of your other talents get passed down. But, the world can't afford to lose your culinary skills. Having him here is already a huge relief.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: He's only just scratched the surface. He's far from ready.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: So, are you going to cook by yourself today?
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Yes indeed. They've been busy all day, and deserve a proper reward.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Haha! Take this potted kumquat with you then. To your new firm's successful opening and continued prosperity.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Oh? Isn't this tree very important to you? You've kept it in the store for years, and never let anyone go around touching it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The cold season just passed, and it's bearing rich fruit. Why... are you giving it to me now?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: To be honest with you, Lee, I don't plan on keeping this shop open much longer.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Are you moving somewhere else?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm about ready to retire.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: It's been more than a decade, huh...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Almost thirty years, including the time before you started coming.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Just got a notice last month saying that this place is going to be demolished and converted into a supermarket. Though, we'd still be able to preserve the shop.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Too many places have been going down around Lungmen these days... The teahouse near my place also got demolished, and they say it's going to turn into a coffee shop.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hah, that's exactly it. It's fine though. My wife and I have worked so hard all these years. It's time to rest now.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Your son and daughter have grown up and moved out as well, so there's no point to holding down the fort any longer. Why don't you travel, take in some new sights and sounds?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We've been in Lungmen all these years, and haven't seen any of Yan's other cities yet.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: The savings we've scrounged up over the years, as well as the compensation from the government, should be enough to give us a few years of good fun.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Lee, you've been all over the place. Got any recommendations for us?
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: I've pretty much settled down in Lungmen too. Asking me to suddenly think back to my days on the road is no easy task.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But, when I think about it a bit more closely, all the bad things that happened are like dark clouds parting after a storm. What remains most vividly... is pleasant scenery and warm smiles.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: And, a noisy produce market.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Hahahaha! You still remember our conversation from back then, huh?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Once I go to Shangshu myself, I'll have to visit that 24/7 produce market as soon as I get the chance.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Good... Very good.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Looking back all these years, every time I saw you, you always said you were going to leave Lungmen. But now, more than ten years later, turns out I'll be the one who's leaving.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: That's right. Every time I tried to leave, there would always be some happy little accident tying me down.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Anyway... Choi, a lot of people come to me before setting off on their trips, asking me to read their fortunes.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We've been old friends for so many years now, so I don't mind giving you a free reading today. Want me to tell you how your journey's going to go?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Haha, sure.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What does it say?
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: This is the Shih-Wang hexagram, which is a symbol of great auspice. On this journey, you will enjoy smooth travels, fair weather, and good health.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hahaha, you really know how to say what people want to hear.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: I'm not trying to butter you up, Choi. This is my heartfelt desire. That fate... will bring us together again in the future.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: ...May fate bring us together again.
attributes.name: Produce Vendor

attributes.content: Winter's almost here! That's right, winter's almost here! That means we're offering great deals here at the supermarket–buy one get one free on certain selections of fresh meat! Winter's almost here! That's right, winter's almost here! That means we're offering great deals here at the supermarket–buy one get one free on...
attributes.name: Supermarket Broadcast

attributes.content: How long have we been standing in line, Hung? Is this ever going to end?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Just a bit longer. There's a big sale at the supermarket today, so a lot more people showed up than usual.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: All over a piece of meat? My legs are gonna fall off from all this standing. I don't even get this tired from holding my martial arts poses.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: A few days ago, Mr. Lee went out of his way to order braised leg meat in scallion oil, saying he wanted to eat it over his birthday. Luckily, they're selling that meat fresh at the supermarket today. Wait a few days longer and we'd only be able to get our hands on the frozen stuff.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: I swear, the older he gets, the more childish he becomes. Whenever he wants to eat something, he has to have it then and there.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Well, birthdays are when your dreams are supposed to come true.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: You say all that, but weren't you the one who picked out a present well in advance and hid it in your room?
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: H-How'd you find out? Didn't I say I can clean my room just fine by myself?!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I didn't go into your room... I just happened to see a bin filled with wrapping paper when I went to take out the trash.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Argh, I didn't think it'd be so hard to wrap up a present either! Had to wrap it and unwrap it so many times before I finally managed to fold it flat.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: What would you like to get, Sir?
attributes.name: Supermarket Worker

attributes.content: A cut of leg meat, please.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Front or rear?
attributes.name: Supermarket Worker

attributes.content: Rear.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Waai Fu, have you seen Aak? Why isn't he here yet? We need to head back after picking up the meat.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: No clue. He disappeared as soon as we went inside.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: (Looks all around) Ugh...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Oh, isn't that him right there? He's walking toward us.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Where've you been all this time? And what did you buy?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Nothing. Just window shopping for something I could pick up for Old Lee.
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: Didn't see anything you liked?
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Hehe, nope.
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: That'll be a total of 471 LMD. Will you be paying cash or card?
attributes.name: Cashier

attributes.content: Excuse me, Miss... I think you did the math wrong.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Huh? We calculate everything by machine. There's no way it would be wrong.
attributes.name: Cashier

attributes.content: (Strange, how is more expensive than what I calculated?)
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Waai Fu, mind opening the bag up for me? Let me add things up again.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Don't worry about it, Hung. You might've made a little slip-up. Let's hurry up and head home with our stuff first.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Yeah, that's right. We've been out all day, and I'm sure Waai Fu here is tired. Let's go home and get some rest.
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: Waai Fu, open the bag.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Here you go, Hung. Comb through everything carefully.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: (Oops, should've kept my mouth shut...)
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: Leg meat, white radishes, pumpkin, lotus root...
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Umm, Hung, there seems to be a pouch of herbs at the bottom of the bag.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Aah... Achoo! *cough* *cough*... What the heck is this stuff? It stings!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *wheeze*... What is this?!
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Huh? What are you two lookin' at me for? Nobody ever said you had to open it up.
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: If anything, the stuff the two of you are gettin' for Lee is way too boring.
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: Anyway, I'll head back first. The two of you can catch up later.
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *cough*... Why you little...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Get back here, you little!
attributes.name: Waai Fu
